title: Big Data has a degree problem
text:
02 Big Data has a degree problem 
eCampus News: Increasing by more than 300 percent since the 1990s, the number of undergraduates in statistics degree programs is hurtling the major into the fastest growing in the U.S. But the growth may not be enough to satisfy the high demand for technology-based fields like data science and database managementâ€”which could spell trouble for colleges and universities anxious to effectively analyze massive amounts of big data.
